CustomField.description: Check to see if docs are signed for PRKS team to begin tasks
CustomField.formula:
IF(Add_On_Product__r.Account__r.Docs_Signed_for_PRKS__c = TRUE, TRUE, IF (Opportunity__r.Account.Docs_Signed_for_PRKS__c = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE))
||
ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.Implementation__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check to see if docs are signed for PRKS team to begin tasks
CustomField.label: Docs Signed for PRKS
